name: CHAOSCITY 混沌とした街
description:
CHAOSCITY

The world will never be the same.
It took exactly split seconds. Everyone went mad and turned violent against each other. It was at that precise moment that those ungodly creatures emerged from the underground. Kate, the sole unafflicted survivor, embarks on a horrendous journey to unveil the truth behind this madness and discover why she is the only one not affected.

Help Kate uncover her destiny.

CHAOSCITY offers:

- A huge seamless world to explore

- A solid game with a story, beginning and ending

- Tile by tile customised world design

- A sci-fi scenario to uncover as you progress through the game

- No ads, no in-app purchases, no repetition

- Joypad support

- Original Game Soundtrack by CYGNOSIC

- A dedicated in-app music player featuring the entire soundtrack

- A dozen of bonus post-game levels and challenges

- Easter eggs & more

You can also get the Original Game Soundtrack here:
https://cygnosicofficial.bandcamp.com/album/chaoscity-original-game-soundtrack

Cheers everyone!!!

(c) 2022 Nerd Game Development
